ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Fascinating article
ygData.msgSnippet: Hasn t ever happened to me.  Not with any of my female characters.  I think the only comment ever made was to my shaman Wow!  You re hot! .  Which is hardly
ygData.messageBody:
Hasn't ever happened to me. Not with any of my female characters. I think
the only comment ever made was to my shaman "Wow! You're hot!". Which is
hardly vulgar. Confusing maybe, because she had a big bear on her head at
the time, but hardly vulgar. </shrug>

Evulia,
red-headed hottie from Kelethin,
Tunare




"Cranfill, Wendy"
<Wendy_Cranfill@m To: "'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'" <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
axtor.com> cc:
Subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Fascinating article
02/15/2002 10:18
AM
Please respond to
eqbards






A-freaking-men!

For an even more frightening study, do a survey of the types of remarks
real
women get in tells while playing this game. While I know there are any
number of "normal" men playing this game (at least I hope).. there is a
disturbing number of men with absolutely NO idea of how to interact
socially
with women. Frightening. And yes, I am prepared for the flames from the
overgeneralized, stereotyping remark I have just made. Someday though, I
will have to compile my screenshots for some amusement!

Halana/Tani


-----Original Message-----
From: EQmagickplayer@... [mailto:EQmagickplayer@...]
Sent: Friday, February 15, 2002 6:24 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] re: Fascinating article


Okee - so EQ caters to men by selling them the idea that playing EQ makes
them more attractive to women & makes them more masculine. Therefore,
enhancing their social & sexual prowess.

Great! I am a 44 year old mother of 2 teenagers - single - well-rounded
(figure wise) - semi-computer literate.

Why was I drawn to EQ? Let's see the unconscious desire to be Firiona Vie?
To seduce young male wood elves & enslave them as my personal sex slaves?

Yeah, right. Obviously it is the author of this article that has some
suppressed sexual/masculine issues that need to be addressed.

Jovvi Songangel - 21 Half elf Bard - Drinal
Charai Bandroichta - 26 Halfling Druid - Drinal
